episode47.name: 48   Hogs fall to Texas Tech
episode47.description: The razorback woes continue as the razorbacks drop their second straight game against old SWC foe Texas Tech. Chuck and Logan try to cope with the loss and talk through the state of the program and what has to happen next.
episode47.keywords: Bert, Bret Bielema, WPS, Hogs, Razorbacks, Texas Tech, Red Raiders,TTU,UA
